body: At least he got what he deserved! Reminds me of that Tomgirl story from "Your Name" the one where Mitsuha instead of doing the events that would result in Taki saving her life. Instead ended up abusing her body swap to fuck around, slowly feminizing and damaging his reputation that he eventually fell and became a Tan Skin Gyaru Tomgirl Whore using HER name from that point onward as he ran away from home! Poor Girl, she was nice to trash, and some being on high let him possess her body as some form of redeeming himself for suicide! Only to cause her to do so! Guess she was allowed to move on as "We're sorry" while he's left to suffer a "I must scream" for his failure! Well deserved, But this is why the powers that be shouldn't leave a person's redemption on others in THIS FORM! If she never talked to him, would she have never been "chosen" I wonder?
Damn that actually made me sick to my stomach
mais que feira de uma fruta
Hmm, why do I feel upset about this
